subject: Mathematics
description: A fun quiz about basic addition!

questions.explanation: When you have a group of 2 and add another group of 2, you get a total of 4!
Starting from 10 and counting up 5 more numbers (11, 12, 13, 14, 15) gets you to 15.
7 plus 8 equals 15. A fun trick is 7+7=14, and since 8 is one more than 7, the answer is one more than 14.

subject: Science
description: How much do you know about the animal kingdom?

questions.questionText: What is the fastest land animal?
questions.explanation: The Cheetah is known for its incredible speed, making it the fastest animal on land.

questions.questionText: Which animal is known as the 'King of the Jungle'?
questions.explanation: The Lion is famously called the 'King of the Jungle' because of its strength and majestic appearance.

subject: Art
description: Test your knowledge of the color wheel!

questions.questionText: What color do you get when you mix red and blue?
questions.explanation: Mixing the primary colors red and blue creates the secondary color purple.

subject: History
description: Travel back in time to the Roman Empire.

questions.questionText: Who was the first emperor of Rome?
questions.explanation: While Julius Caesar was a powerful leader, his great-nephew Augustus was officially the first Roman Emperor.

subject: Music
description: Can you identify these musical instruments?

questions.questionText: Which of these is a string instrument?
questions.explanation: A violin creates music using strings, while a flute uses wind and a drum is a percussion instrument.

subject: Geography
description: How well do you know the world's capitals?

questions.questionText: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the famous capital city of France, known for the Eiffel Tower.

questions.questionText: What is the capital of Japan?
questions.explanation: Tokyo is the bustling and vibrant capital city of Japan.
